question: I would like to goto Jihad in Palestine to free MAshid Al-Aqsa, without my mothers permission is allowed?
answer:
QUESTION
I would like to goto Jihad in Palestine to free MAshid Al-Aqsa, without my mothers permission is allowed?
ANSWER


Share:
It is the wish and desire of every Muslim for Musjidul Aqsa to be freed from
Zionist rule and oppression.

The Palestinian people are making every possible effort to do that but are
faced with many obstacles. From the apparent situation there, it is unlikely
that your physical presence there may make any signification difference. We,
therefore, advise you assist in any other way. Most importantly, make Du'aa
for the liberation of the victims of oppression.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
